group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*...
So Kamihama even has a place like this...

group_1.textRight: Do you like it?

group_1.textLeft: I do.
There's so much green here.@It's quiet and peaceful.
I'm sure everyone will love it...
I'll have to add this to the mapu, too.

group_1.textRight: Yes!
Oh, we'd better eat our fresh taiyaki before@it gets cold.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, after I even bought it myself...!
Thank you for the food.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, thanks for the food!

group_1.textLeft: ...Delicious, it's amazingly sweet...

group_1.textRight: I'm glad you like it.@We eat it sometimes after club activities.

group_1.textLeft: Club activities...

group_1.textRight: Are you curious?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, there weren't many kids my age@where I grew up...

group_1.textRight: Oh, I get it... You can't do that without other people,@huh.

group_1.textLeft: What kind of club are you in, Natsuki?

group_1.textRight: I'm the manager and cheerleader for the@baseball team!

group_1.textLeft: Man ager? Cheer reader?

group_1.textRight: I help the baseball players out at practice and@cheer them on at matches!

group_1.textLeft: Matches...
You get together with a lot of children your age,@then?
That sounds amazing...

group_1.textRight: It is amazing!
GO! FIGHT! WIN!!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: I'll be cheering for as long as my voice can, and I'll@even put up the traditional banner.

group_1.textLeft: Heeh...@I kind of want to see that.

group_1.textRight: Then, do you want to come and see it?
This weekend, we're playing an exchange match@at the riverbed in Chuo Ward.

group_1.textLeft: May I?

group_1.textRight: Yes! Please come and watch!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you!@I'll clear my schedule.

group_1.textRight: Oh, yeah, why don't we exchange contact@information?

group_1.textLeft: Sure!

group_1.textRight: Heeh, fishing in the river...

group_1.textLeft: I'm pretty good at it.
If you ever have a chance to visit the village,@I'll show you.
It's a bit far, but...
It's very nice as a tourist destination.

group_1.textRight: That sounds good...!@I could spend some time relaxing!

group_1.textLeft: Right?
...Ah, it's this time already.@It felt like it was going slower.

group_1.textRight: Oh, yeah...
Well, is there anywhere else you want to go?

group_1.textLeft: The mapu has been filled enough, but...@there is one more place...
Do you mind going with me to the radio tower?

group_1.textRight: The radio tower...@That's in Chuo Ward.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, the radio tower has an observation deck,@right?
That's where I want to show everyone how the@people we're supposed to be protecting live.

group_1.textRight: That we should protect...?

group_1.textLeft: But...
I'm not sure I'll be able to make it safely through@Chuo Ward, as it's the biggest area in Kamihama.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see...
In that case, I'll guide you!
